definitions.definition: The substance making up the central part of the trunk and branches of a tree. Used as a material for construction, to manufacture various items, etc. or as fuel.
definitions.example: There was lots of wood on the beach.

definitions.definition: The wood of a particular species of tree.
definitions.example: Teak is much used for outdoor benches, but a number of other woods are also suitable, such as ipé, redwood, etc.
He got lost in the woods beyond Seattle.
We need more wood for the fire.

definitions.definition: A type of golf club, the head of which was traditionally made of wood.

definitions.example: That girl at the strip club gave me wood.

definitions.definition: To cover or plant with trees.
To supply with wood, or get supplies of wood for.
definitions.example: to wood a steamboat or a locomotive

definitions.definition: To take or get a supply of wood.
(sometimes offensive, of a person) A peckerwood.
